captions.text: Hello everybody, my name is Markiplier and welcome to Next Car Game.
A game that promises realistic soft body physics.
And if you don't know what that means, well, I mean, just kinda watch!
It's deformable bodies with actually interacting physical parts that break and smash in realistic ways.
I'm gonna play around for a little bit in this little playground they got here
and you guys can watch the mayhem, and enjoy!
Come here, come here! I want blood!
Oh, i barerly got any blood
You! you got, you know, ugh, ok allright, well allright then

comments.text:

asymmetricalness XD﻿
